FuncDef: This command configures RFC 2684,Multiprotocol Encapsulation over ATM Adaptation Layer 5, encapsulation for an ATM PVCC delimited SAP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the encapsulation type. Values-aal5snap-routed - Routed encapsulation for LLC encapsulated circuit (LLC/SNAP precedes protocol datagram) as defined in RFC 2684..

ExtraInfo: Default: encapsulation aal5snap-routed (for IES service SAPs)
